tool_description: Cheap and lightweight API to get rich Amazon product metadata
title: Amazon Product Price Data

api_list.name: product
api_list.description:
Get Amazon product price information by locale.

ASINs provided will be searched by the locale provided, e.g. if `B005YQZ1KE,B074R8RQQ2` were provided and `US` as a locale were provided, it will provide metadata from only `amazon.com`.

Please note that price data may be up to 30 minutes out of date.

Currently supported locales:

US (amazon.com)
UK (amazon.co.uk)
CA (amazon.ca)
IN (amazon.in)
FR (amazon.fr)

More coming soon!

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description:
Currently supported locales:

US (amazon.com)
UK (amazon.co.uk)
CA (amazon.ca)
IN (amazon.in)
FR (amazon.fr)

More coming soon!
